speaker: Sarah
text: Alright, team — let’s talk about next week. First, what’s the plan for the payment module?

"plan for" → /plæn fər/ (n links into for)
"payment module" → /ˈpeɪmənt ˈmɑːʤuːl/ (t links into noun)

speaker: You
text: I’m meeting with the backend team on Monday. We’re going to review the latest API changes.
ipa: aɪm ˈmiːtɪŋ wɪð ðə ˈbækˌɛnd tiːm ɑn ˈmʌndeɪ | wɪr ˈɡoʊɪŋ tə rɪˈvju ðə ˈleɪtəst ˌeɪpiːˈaɪ ˈʧeɪnʤəz

speaker: Sarah
text: Perfect. So you think you’ll be able to integrate it next sprint?

speaker: You
text: Yes, I will start the integration on Tuesday. If all goes well, we will have completed it by Friday.

speaker: Sarah
text: Nice. And what about the UI redesign?

speaker: You

speaker: Sarah
